General.Name: The Oncology Institute Inc
General.Description: The Oncology Institute, Inc., an oncology company, provides medical oncology services in the United States. Its services include physician services, in-house infusion and dispensary, clinical trial services, outpatient stem cell transplants and transfusions programs, and patient support. The company also offers and manages clinical trial services, such as managing clinical trials, palliative care programs, and stem cell transplants for cancer patients. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Cerritos, California.
General.Address: 18000 Studebaker Road, Cerritos, CA, United States, 90703
